articles.title: Earth has a new 'MOON' - and it's here for at least 1500 years - Daily Mail
articles.description: The 'quasi-moon', called 2023 FW13, was discovered by experts using the Pan-STARRS telescope at the top of the Haleakala volcano in Hawaii.
articles.content:
Earth has a new moon - or at least a 'quasi-moon', a new study has revealed. 
A quasi-moon is a space rock that circles the Earth, but is gravitationally bound by the sun.
